changeSet.sql: CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS service_registry
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS service_registry

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name of the web service

column.name: security_type
column.remarks: The type of security implemented by the web service i.e. 0 = None, 1 = Mutual SSL, etc

column.name: supports_compression
column.remarks: Does the web service support compression

column.name: endpoint
column.remarks: The endpoint for the web service

column.name: service_class
column.remarks: The fully qualified name of the Java service class

column.name: wsdl_location
column.remarks: The location of the WSDL defining the web service on the classpath

column.name: username
column.remarks: The username to use created accessing a web service with username-password security enabled

column.name: password
column.remarks: The password to use created accessing a web service with username-password security enabled
